- [ ] Game branch: [Branch]

### Strategy

`head/default/StrikerActionProvider.json`
- shootIntoGoal
- enablePassing
- checkIfKeeperWantsToPlayBall

`head/default/PlayingRoleProvider.json`
- assignBishop
- assignBishopWithLessThanFourFieldPlayers

`head/default/KeeperActionProvider.json`
- mayGenuflect
